overview:
Andy O’Dell leads the Skepsu corporation as Chief Executive Officer, encompassing business management, strategic decision-making, tactical execution, business development, and fund raising. Oâ€™Dell has a proven track record of identifying, cultivating, and maintaining new business partnerships and emerging markets in both small and large enterprises.

Over the past few years, O’Dell served as Chief Operations Officer and VP of Sales for a regional real estate development firm. Prior to that, Oâ€™Dell managed a $10M book of high-profile Fortune 500 clients as Director of Sales for a full service marketing firm. O’Dell also has extensive experience in the technology sector as a progressive senior business development professional focused on telecommunications, hardware and network architecture.
